about_the_game:
REVEREX: DX is the expansion and Steam release of the award-winning game, REVEREX.

The scientists at the Zlyodomov Biomedical Manufacture Concern (ZBMC) think they’ve created a device which can pull people out of comas: the REVEREX. As their top technicians, its up to you and a friend to operate the machine through it’s maiden voyage, ensuring the stability of your patient’s mind and body through the entire ordeal.

Navigate stages rife with unusual geometry, shifting gravity, and strange visuals. Complete challenging maintenance tasks to make traversal easier. Get out again before the dream world, or your patient, are destabilized for good.

  • Run, Jump, and Parkour your way through the dream world.

  • Work with your Vitalist to stay buffed and complete the operation.

  • Execute stunts, skips and gravity defying tricks to reach the end before your patient is destabilized.

  • Master minigames to keep your Navigator & patient stable.

  • Clear debuffs as fast as you can to keep the simulation going.

  • Give the Navigator powerful buffs to allow skips and access to hard-to-reach spots.

Please note that REVEREX: DX contains flashing lights, bright colors and other visuals that may cause adverse effects to individuals with photosensitivity issues including Epilepsy. Exercise caution before playing if you have a history of photosensitivity.

REVEREX: DX is the expansion and Steam release of the award-winning game, REVEREX.

The scientists at the Zlyodomov Biomedical Manufacture Concern (ZBMC) think they’ve created a device which can pull people out of comas: the REVEREX. As their top technicians, its up to you and a friend to operate the machine through it’s maiden voyage, ensuring the stability of your patient’s mind and body through the entire ordeal.

Navigate stages rife with unusual geometry, shifting gravity, and strange visuals. Complete challenging maintenance tasks to make traversal easier. Get out again before the dream world, or your patient, are destabilized for good.

name: REVEREX: DX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600/Intel i5-9600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: REVEREX: DX is a 2-player asymmetric experience that blends platforming action and microgames on a visually stunning trip through the mind. Don the roles of Lab Technicians operating an experimental Coma Treatment device, explore the deepest reaches of the subconscious and rescue your patient!
